timeline.body: We don't always do this, but I think we should -- can you add `@size(max = 256)` so that this field is in sync with the database column max in the migrations file? But first see my comment about 256 there.

timeline.body: Do you need this? Shouldn't the forumUrl already be in the DB after line 522? Or are you trying to verify that it sticks after refresh?

replies.bodyText: Hm I included the refresh because I was modelling the structure of other update tests. I think verifying it still sticks after is refresh is a good idea, mimics the behaviour of when a user updates the forumUrl
replies.author: nrzhao4

timeline.body:
For future, you don't have to say "it is ", the test runner will automatically say something like:
"expected: potato"
"actual: tomato"

commits_in_main.message: Don't use changing ID as identifier (#3969)
first set of test fixes for changes to test repos (#4105)
Check not frozen before saving DAG (#4289)
Fix all necessary sonarcloud issues in workflow resource (#4356)
make endpoint backwards compatible with CLI (#4393)
remove garbage from version metadata table, add constraints to prevent reoccurence
Change to new topic db schema and make some adjustments
update topicAutomatic for workflows on refresh and tools on refresh and creation
Removing BitBucket Tokens from non-bitbucket tests (#5076)
convert dockstore-common, webservice, most integration tests to junit 5 (#5297)
